title: Superman Hamlyn
description: Anthology of reprinted stories, spanning the publication history of Superman's appearances in "Action Comics" and "Superman." Cover galleries, and portions of important stories, are reproduced in full color, but most of the book is black and white. Foreword by anthology editor E. Nelson Bridwell, longtime assistant to the principal Superman editors Mort Weisinger and Julius Schwartz.
author: Jerry Siegel
